title: Google says buggy Wi-Fi on Pixel 6 will be fixed in March update
content:
Google’s Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro might be a pair of impressive phones, but they seem to have recurring problems with software bugs. Some Pixel 6 owners have been reporting an issue with Wi-Fi shutting off on its own randomly, which Google says will be fixed in the next monthly security update. There are

The post Google says buggy Wi-Fi on Pixel 6 will be fixed in March update appeared first on xda-developers.
